title: boAt Rockerz 255F Sports Wireless Headset with Super Extra Bass
description: boAt signature audio: boAt Rockerz 255F, while being lightweight in design pumps out your favourite tunes with powerful HD sound and deep boosted bass Powered By Qualcomm CSR8635 Chipset : High Level functionality is provided to the boAt Rockerz 255F by the Advanced Qualcomm CSR 8635 Chipset providing the features of the latest Bluetooth 4.1 Version Rock on the Smarter Way: With Alexa built-in, delve deeper into the world of smartness 10 mins charge, 45 mins play: The boAt Rockerz 255F are equipped with a 110 mAH battery that'll surely allow you to spend your time with these earphones a quarter of your day.
